column5: Wondering which shop sells units thank you
My best guess is ProTackle in Belleville. Opens at 5 am.

buy it off the ebay  I got this, works like a charm. http://www.ebay.com/itm/Humminbird-Ice-45-Flasher-Fishfinder-Color-with-Fiber-Optic-Display-407030-1-/350960289954?pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item51b6dd08a2  $470+TAX at Cabelas Canada, you're lucky if you find a tackle shop that sells it cheaper
Ya, protackle is your best bet. Canadian tire in belleville has a pretty good fishing department, but not sure if they have flashers.  S.
